name: Hemogoblins
description:
A demo visual novel made for my University grad show (Thus all the comments at the beginning about the grad show, ignore those m'pal) made to display my art and my writing,

You play as a human, transported mysteriously to an alien planet. This is a shortened version that has been cut down to let you click through short scenes letting you get to know each character and the world they occupy.

Full version may be finished in the future.
